cheat.description: Infinite capacity points. You still have to have enough points to make the job change, but no points will be subtracted from your total
All items in shops are free. You must have enough to cover the item, but will not be charged
Knife casts a FIRE spell when used as a item in battle
Knife casts a FIRE3 spell when used as a item in battle
